channel.title: Certified Programming with Dependent Types updates

item.title: Renamed "Tactics" module to "CpdtTactics"
item.author: adamc@csail.mit.edu
item.description: This avoids a name clash with a module included with Coq.

item.title: A pass through Chapter 2
item.author: adamc@csail.mit.edu
item.description: I've removed some material on dependent pattern-matching but not yet compensated by adding it back in somewhere else.

item.title: A pass through Chapter 1
item.author: adamc@csail.mit.edu
item.description: I've started passes through all chapters, with an eye toward getting ready both for my fall class and publication by MIT Press. I'm adding bibliographic references, index entries, and additional exercises, along with the usual tweaks and improvements. The version I've just put up is the result of a pass through Chapter 1. Feedback is especially welcome now, as I get the book into final publishable shape!

item.title: Tweaks to recent update to satisfy coqdoc 8.3
item.author: adam@chlipala.net

item.title: Updated to work with both Coq 8.3 and Coq 8.2
item.author: adam@chlipala.net

item.title: A significant revision pass, based on extensive feedback kindly provided by Pierre Cast√©ran
